trans-unit.source: Specifies when and how a part will be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Especifica quando e como uma parte será instanciada.

trans-unit.source: In the course of composition, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> needs instances of the objects described by exports in order to fill imports.
trans-unit.target: No decorrer de composição, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> precisa de instâncias de objetos descritos por exportações para preencher importações.

trans-unit.source: If a one export is used to fill multiple imports, there are two possible behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exportação de um for usada para preencher várias importações, há dois comportamentos possíveis.

trans-unit.source: Either a single instance of the exported object is created, and a reference to the same object is given to every importer, or a separate instance of the exported object is created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Uma única instância do objeto exportado é criada e uma referência ao mesmo objeto é fornecida para cada importador, ou uma instância separada do objeto exportado é criada para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: Which behavior occurs depends on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute> attached to the export and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Que ocorre depende o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute> anexado à exportação e o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A> do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: Both of which will contain a value from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Que contém um valor da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: If the policies are incompatible, that export will not be considered a match for the given import.
trans-unit.target: Se as políticas são incompatíveis, que a exportação não será considerada uma correspondência para a importação.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the interaction of these two properties.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir resume a interação entre essas duas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Any or none specified.
trans-unit.target: Do exportação <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> Especifica qualquer ou não há nenhuma especificada.

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Shared
trans-unit.target: Do exportação <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> Especifica compartilhado

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies NonShared
trans-unit.target: Do exportação <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> Especifica NonShared

trans-unit.source: Any
trans-unit.target: Qualquer

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância única, compartilhada, do objeto exportado será criada.

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância única, compartilhada, do objeto exportado será criada.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do objeto exportado será criada para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: Shared
trans-unit.target: Compartilhado

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância única, compartilhada, do objeto exportado será criada.

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância única, compartilhada, do objeto exportado será criada.

trans-unit.source: The export will not be considered a match for the import.
trans-unit.target: A exportação não será considerada uma correspondência para a importação.

trans-unit.source: NonShared
trans-unit.target: Não compartilhado

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do objeto exportado será criada para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: The export will not be considered a match for the import.
trans-unit.target: A exportação não será considerada uma correspondência para a importação.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do objeto exportado será criada para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> will use the most appropriate <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> for the part given the current context.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> usará o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> mais apropriado para a parte, considerando o contexto atual.

trans-unit.source: This is the default <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> padrão.

trans-unit.source: By default, <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> will use <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />, unless the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> or importer requests <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> usará <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />, a menos que o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> ou o importador solicite <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a new non-shared instance of the associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> will be created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> for every requestor.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que uma única instância não compartilhada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> associado será criada pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> para cada solicitante.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a single shared instance of the associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> will be created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> and shared by all requestors.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que uma única instância compartilhada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> associado será criada pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> e compartilhada por todos os solicitantes.
